events.name: Construction
events.description: The root container node for the construction event.
events.wd_description: process that consists of the building or assembling of a building or infrastructure

entities.name: investor_of_the_construction
entities.wd_description: social entity established to meet needs or pursue goals

entities.wd_description: structure, typically with a roof and walls, standing more or less permanently in one place

entities.name: the_material_used_for_building
entities.wd_description: material used for construction purposes

entities.name: location
entities.wd_description: point or an area on something's surface or elsewhere

events.description: The planning decision making procedures before the construction event begins.
events.wd_description: process of determining the activities required to achieve a desired goal

entities.name: construction_plan
entities.wd_description: outline of a strategy for achievement of an objective

entities.wd_description: point or an area on something's surface or elsewhere

events.name: Construction
events.description: The building or facility is being constructed.
events.wd_description: process that consists of the building or assembling of a building or infrastructure

entities.name: constructor
entities.wd_description: social entity established to meet needs or pursue goals

events.name: Operation
events.description: The construction is complete and the building or facility is put into operation.
events.wd_description: moment when an institution starts operating

entities.name: guests
entities.wd_description: social entity established to meet needs or pursue goals

events.name: Make Resolution
events.description: The client makes the decision to start a project to construct a building.
events.wd_description: cognitive process resulting in choosing a course of action among several alternative possibilities

events.name: Announcement
events.description: The client makes a public announcement to recruit teams to do the project of construction.
events.wd_description: printed, spoken, or published statement or notice of an event or other news

entities.name: announcer
entities.wd_description: elements of the mass media that focus on delivering news

entities.name: public
entities.wd_description: grouping of individual people

entities.wd_description: point or an area on something's surface or elsewhere

events.name: Design
events.description: A participating team makes a concrete design of the building architecture.
events.wd_description: application of engineering principles and technology to building design and construction

entities.name: construction_company
entities.wd_description: legal entity representing an association of people, whether natural, legal or a mixture of both, with a specific objective

entities.name: construction_plan
entities.wd_description: outline of a strategy for achievement of an objective

entities.name: designing_location
entities.wd_description: point or an area on something's surface or elsewhere

events.name: Bidding
events.description: The official bidding process to decide who to conduct the project.

entities.wd_description: point or an area on something's surface or elsewhere

events.name: Approval
events.description: The plan is approved and finalized.
events.wd_description: process of giving effect to documentation in international law

events.name: Preparation
events.description: The construction is being prepared.
events.wd_description: activity of achieving readiness for some event or activity

events.name: Build
events.description: The construction is being build.
events.wd_description: process that consists of the building or assembling of a building or infrastructure

events.name: Completion
events.description: The construction process is completed.
events.wd_description: completed event

events.name: Recruit Workers
events.description: The company is recruiting workers to build the architecture..
events.wd_description: process of attracting, selecting and appointing candidates to a job or other organization

entities.name: workers
entities.wd_description: person employed in the physical work during construction

entities.name: recruiting_place
entities.wd_description: point or an area on something's surface or elsewhere

events.name: Land Preparation
events.description: Land cleaning and preparation before the construction begins.
events.wd_description: activity that purifies people, animals and objects of dirt and other particles

entities.name: washing_liquid
entities.wd_description: object used for cleaning

events.name: Evaluate Safety
events.description: The company is evaluating whether the land is safe enough to start the construction.
events.wd_description: value judgement about a fact, an object or a person

entities.name: evaluator
entities.wd_description: social entity established to meet needs or pursue goals

entities.name: evaluation_results
entities.wd_description: final consequence or product of a sequence of actions or events

events.description: The workers manufactures and composes some artifacts for the construction event.
events.wd_description: industrial activity producing goods for sale using labor and machines

entities.wd_description: facility where goods are industrially made, or processed

entities.name: objects_used_for_construction

events.name: Transport Artifacts
events.description: The client may be responsible for maintenance and repairs, and the company may no longer be liable for any problems with the building or facility.
events.wd_description: human-directed movement of things or people between locations

entities.name: transporter
entities.wd_description: social entity established to meet needs or pursue goals

events.name: Accident
events.description: Some unexpected accidents during the construction process.
events.wd_description: unforeseen and unplanned event or circumstance, often with a negative outcome

entities.wd_description: person employed in the physical work during construction

entities.name: accident_place

events.name: Incident
events.description: The specific incident for the accident.
events.wd_description: an occurrence, other than an accident, associated with the operation of an aircraft which affects or could affect the safety of operation

events.name: Consequence
events.description: The container node for consequence of the incident (with XOR on injury or death)
events.wd_description: process of being victimised or becoming a victim

events.name: Public Concern
events.description: The accident raises public concerns and discussions.
events.wd_description: behavioral and cognitive process of selectively concentrating on a discrete aspect of information, whether deemed subjective or objective, while ignoring other perceivable information

entities.name: public
entities.wd_description: grouping of individual people

events.name: Pause
events.description: The construction project pauses to handle the accident.
events.wd_description: business or legal strategy decision

entities.name: original_time
entities.wd_description: dimension in which events can be ordered from the past through the present into the future

entities.name: new_time
entities.wd_description: dimension in which events can be ordered from the past through the present into the future

events.name: Justice Procedure
events.description: Justice Procedure for the accident.
events.wd_description: juridical fact in which the subject who made it happen acted under free will

events.description: The construction site reopens and the constructing process continues.

events.name: Injure

events.wd_description: Physiological wound caused by an external source.

entities.wd_description: material used for construction purposes

events.name: Die
events.description: The worker dies during the accident.

events.description: The public feedbacks, comments and suggestions for the building.

entities.name: replier
entities.wd_description: being that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood (avoid use with P31; use Q5 for humans)

entities.name: fault
entities.wd_description:
abnormal condition or defect at the component, equipment, or sub-system level which may lead to an equipment failure
